filewatcherUtil.fwNLSInitSuccess: Turbine NLS has been initialized successfully

buildscripts.containerBuildSuccess: Container image has been built successfully
buildscripts.buildcontainerCreateSuccess: Build container image has been created successfully
buildscripts.noHelmChart: A Helm chart cannot be found for the project. Place a Helm chart within the chart subfolder of the project.
buildscripts.buildFailMissingFile: The build failed because required files are missing. See validation results for details.
buildscripts.noDeployment: A deployment file in the Helm chart could not be found.
buildscripts.noService: A service file in the Helm chart could not be found.
buildscripts.podFailedToStart: Pod for Helm release {{- projectName}} failed to start.
buildscripts.invalidMavenSettings: Build aborted. Failed to get the user Maven settings
buildscripts.missingImagePushRegistry: The project will not build due to missing Image Push Registry. Run the Set Deployment Registry command to set a new Image Push Registry to build projects.
buildscripts.invalidImagePushRegistry: Codewind was unable to push an image to the Image Push Registry. Please make sure it is a valid Image Push Registry with the appropriate permissions.
buildscripts.wrongImagePushRegistry: The project will not build with the new Image Push Registry. Please remove and re-add the project to deploy to the new Image Push Registry.
buildscripts.odoBuildPushFailMsg: Failed to build or deploy odo application
buildscripts.odoBuildUrlFailMsg: Fail to create URL for odo application

buildApplicationTask.pomChangeDetected: pom.xml change detected, running clean build
buildApplicationTask.configChangeDetected: Server config file change detected, running application build
buildApplicationTask.configBuildFail: Application build for server config change failed. Please check the build log view for more details.
buildApplicationTask.buildFail: Application build failed. Please check the log in the build log view for more details.
buildApplicationTask.missingServerXml:
The Liberty server configuration file was not found at {{- path}}.
	Please move the server.xml to this location, or copy one in from another Microprofile project.

containerBuildTask.containerBuildFailDockerfileGenerate: Container image failed to build: failed on generating Dockerfile
containerBuildTask.containerBuildFailDockerfileSetup: Container image failed to build: failed on Dockerfile setup
containerBuildTask.containerBuildFailImageExist: Container image failed to build: container image already exists
containerBuildTask.containerBuildFailArtifactsMissing: Container image failed to build: the image could not be built because the artifacts directory was not found
containerBuildTask.containerBuildFail: Container image failed to build: failed on running build command
containerBuildTask.containerBuildSuccess: Container image has been built successfully

containerRunTask.containerRunTaskFailed: Start container stage failed: failed to get deploymentID/podID/releaseID

projectStatusController.serverNotStarted: Liberty server did not start due to internal error.
projectStatusController.appStatusContainerStopped: Application stopped unexpectedly. Check the application logs for details.
projectStatusController.buildStateMap: No current build information available for the project
projectStatusController.appErrorWhenStopping: An error occurred while the application was stopping. Check the application logs for details.
projectStatusController.pingTimeout: Timeout: {{- pingMessage}}. The application is taking longer than expected to start. Please check the application logs for problems and ensure the project's 'healthCheck' setting is correct. Last error message received: {{- errMsg}}

appStatusError.httpRequestTimeout: Http request is failed due to timeout error
appStatusError.errorGetContainerInfo: Could not retrieve container info for the project
appStatusError.errorGetPort: Could not retrieve the port for the project
appStatusError.errorGetIP: Could not retrieve the ip for the project
appStatusError.errorGetHostname: Could not retrieve the hostname for the project service
appStatusError.badStatusCode: Received response, but with bad status code {{statusCode}} when pinging project

requiredFiles.label: Missing required file
requiredFiles.details: {{- filename}} is required but was not found.
requiredFiles.orDetails: At least one of {{missingFileList}} is required but was not found.

parentGroupId.label: Missing Liberty parent POM groupId
parentGroupId.details: A Liberty parent POM declaration is required. The parent groupId should be <groupId>net.wasdev.wlp.maven.parent</groupId>

parentArtifactId.label: Missing Liberty parent POM artifactId
parentArtifactId.details: A Liberty parent POM declaration is required. The parent artifactId should be <artifactId>liberty-maven-app-parent</artifactId>

parentPOM.label: Missing Liberty parent POM
parentPOM.details: A Liberty parent POM declaration is required. See the project import documentation for details.

activationNotFound.label: Missing profile activation
activationNotFound.details: Missing a profile activation property libertyEnv=microclimate. See the project import documentation for more details.

pluginExtensions.label: liberty-maven-plugin extensions not enabled
pluginExtensions.details: The liberty-maven-plugin is configured but does not include <extensions>true</extensions>

looseAppConfig.label: liberty-maven-plugin looseApplication is not enabled
looseAppConfig.details: It is recommended for the liberty-maven-plugin configuration to include <looseApplication>true</looseApplication>. This configuration speeds up application updates.

libertyPluginNotFound.label: Missing liberty-maven-plugin configuration
libertyPluginNotFound.details: A microclimate profile is configured but the liberty-maven-plugin was not found. It should be added to the build plugins section of the microclimate profile. See the project import documentation for a configuration example.

microclimateProfileNotFound.label: A maven profile named 'microclimate' was not found.
microclimateProfileNotFound.details: A microclimate build profile is recommended for Microprofile projects. See the project import documentation for details.

migrateNonRootUser.label: Migration may required to run project container as a non-root user
migrateNonRootUser.details:
Please see our documentation here on how to migrate your application to run as a non-root user:
	https://microclimate-dev2ops.github.io/troubleshooting#microclimate-liberty-projects-are-broken

foundSpringGroupId.label: Spring Boot dependency not found
foundSpringGroupId.details: This project is identified as a Spring project but the pom.xml does not have the required configuration for Spring projects. See the Importing Projects documentation for more information.

foundInvalidPackaging.label: Invalid packaging for Spring project
foundInvalidPackaging.details: This project's pom.xml specifies an invalid packaging for its output. Only Spring projects with jar packaging are supported for this project type.
